judge: Game Preparation - Judge - The game has started. Players, confirm your identities.
Day 1,Night - Judge - Night has fallen, werewolves please choose a target.
Day 1,Daytime - Judge - No one died during the night
Day 1,Daytime - Judge - Starting from [2], please give the last words
Day 2,Night - Judge - Night has fallen, special roles please act
Day 2,Daytime - Judge - Those who died last night are [5]
End - Judge - Congratulations villagers, the werewolves have been eliminated
task: Werewolves discuss quietly and choose a victim
Seer, choose one player to investigate
Werewolves discuss and choose a victim
Medic, choose one player to protect
Seer, choose one player to investigate

Day 1 Daytime - [1] is speaking.text: I woke up alive, so the medic probably chose well. Player two kept quiet all night and it worries me.
Day 1 Daytime - [1] is speaking.summary: Player 1 suspects player 2 due to silence and thanks the medic for keeping everyone safe the first night.

Day 1 Daytime - [2] is speaking.text: I was quiet because I didn't hear any useful leads. Throwing shade at me just because I'm calm is reckless.
Day 1 Daytime - [2] is speaking.summary: Player 2 deflects suspicion and calls the accusation emotional.

Day 1 Daytime - [3] is speaking.text: I am the seer. I checked player two last night and saw a red aura. Vote them out and we protect the village.
Day 1 Daytime - [3] is speaking.summary: Player 3 reveals as seer and claims player 2 is a werewolf.

Day 2 Daytime - [4] is speaking.text: The werewolf struck back at player five. We should trust the seer's read and remove player three who might be compromised now.
Day 2 Daytime - [4] is speaking.summary: Player 4 wants to continue trusting the seer and eliminate player 3 after player 5's death.

Day 2 Daytime - [3] is speaking.text: Hold on, I was attacked during the night but survived thanks to the medic. Player six is actually a gray read to me.
Day 2 Daytime - [3] is speaking.summary: Player 3 claims the medic saved them and shifts suspicion toward player 6.
